page.title: 12A MONK'S DAY,FORT AUGUSTUS.
page.content: The monks normally rise at 20 minutes to 6,and go to morning office which is at 6a.m.This service lasts for half an hour,then breakfast is available from 6.30_8.30.Community mass is at 20 minutes to 8,but either before or after this mass there is a period of private prayer.At a quarter to 9 the monks start their various kinds of work like teaching,bee_keeping and gardening and this goes on until 12.30p.m when they go to midday office.Lunch is served at 10 minutes to 1.After lunch there is a period of recreation and more work. There is a break for tea at 10 minutes to 4 and more work until 6p.m when they have supper.Vespers is at twenty minutes to 7 and then another recreation period until compline at 8.15p.m. Monks may then go to bed if they wish but most are in bed by 10p.m.
